hymn.title: There's a Man in the glory

layout.singingstanza: There's a Man in the glo -- ry Whose Life is for me. He's pure and He's ho -- ly, Tri -- um -- phant and free. He's wise and He's lov -- ing How ten -- der is He! His Life in the glo -- ry, My life must be; His Life in the glo -- ry, My life must be.

lyrics.stanza: There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me. He's pure and He's holy, Triumphant and free. He's wise and He's loving How tender is He! His Life in the glory, My life must be; His Life in the glory, My life must be.

There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me. In Him is no sickness; No weakness has He. He's strong and in vigor, How buoyant is He! His Life in the glory My life may be; His Life in the glory My life may be.

There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me. His peace is abiding; How patient is He! He's joyful and radiant, Expecting to see His Life in the glory Lived out in me; His Life in the glory Lived out in me.
